quoteText: To a buyer or other successor in the event of a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Itch.ioâ€™s assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which Personal Information held by Itch.io about our Service users is among the assets transferred.
title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
